com.bermudalocket.smartmobs

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bermudalocket.smartmobs.Configuration

  • final class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    The configuration class responsible for interacting with the YAML configuration and serialized data.

      private static java.io.File ATTACKS_FILE

      Convenience reference to the WorldGuard exemptions data file.

      • serializeZones

        private static void serializeZones()
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Serializes all zones to zones.txt in JavaPlugin.getDataFolder().
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be written to.

      • reloadZones

        private static void reloadZones()
        Deserializes all zones from zones.txt in JavaPlugin.getDataFolder(). Clears any zones that share a name with a newly loaded zone.

      • isWorldInScope

        static boolean isWorldInScope(org.bukkit.World world)
        Checks if a world should be managed by this plugin.
        Parameters:
        world - the world.
        Returns:
        true if the world should be managed by this plugin.
